name: Windows 8 APIMASH Starter Kits
tagline: Windows 8 APIMASH Starter Kits demonstrate how to use public Web Service API's such as Edmunds, Tom-Tom, Twitter, Tumblr, Yelp, Meetup and many others.
body: Windows 8 APIMASH Starter Kits demonstrate how to use public Web Service API's such as Edmunds, Tom-Tom, Twitter, Tumblr, Yelp, Meetup and many others. These Starter Kits will put you on the fast path to publishing your first Windows 8 App using these rich datasets.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
